# Commercial Cleaning Services

## **Commercial Cleaning Services for Chicagoland Businesses**

A clean and organized workspace is essential for any business to thrive. It not only leaves a good impression on your clients but also boosts the morale of your employees. Maintaining cleanliness in a commercial property requires a lot of effort and resources, especially when the business needs to run seamlessly without any interruptions. That's where The Heiser Group comes in! With years of experience in the industry, we offer comprehensive and customizable commercial cleaning solutions to meet the unique needs of businesses across Chicagoland.

## **Our Standard Cleaning Services**

Our services are tailored to meet your specific needs. From janitorial services to carpet cleaning and more, we offer a wide range of services, including bathroom cleaning and disinfecting of surfaces in kitchen areas. Our highly trained and experienced cleaning experts utilize industry-leading equipment and techniques to deliver exceptional results. We are dedicated to creating a clean and healthy work environment for your business.

## ‍

### Standard Professional Cleaning Services include:

*   Sweeping and mopping hard surface floors
*   Vacuuming carpeted areas
*   Removing all trash from waste baskets and receptacles
*   Cleaning and sanitizing bathroom and kitchen areas
*   Dusting horizontal surfaces
*   Spot-cleaning glass surfaces
*   Removing cobwebs

### Popular Add-Ons:

*   Window Washing
*   Upholstery Cleaning
*   Power Washing

## **Our Industrial Cleaning Services**

Our specialized cleaning services cater to the unique challenges and requirements of industrial facilities. With expertise in sanitizing various surfaces, handling hazardous chemicals and maintaining safety standards, we provide customized cleaning plans that address industry regulations. Our goal is to ensure a clean and safe environment for both employees and visitors.

## What to Expect from The Heiser Group

With extensive service coverage across the Chicagoland area, The Heiser Group is committed to delivering excellence in every aspect of our work. We provide comprehensive liability insurance for peace of mind and offer efficient scheduling and flexibility to accommodate your schedule and business needs.

### Service Coverage

We proudly serve businesses from Lake County, Illinois to Kenosha, Wisconsin, offering reliable and consistent commercial cleaning services. With our easy accessibility and local expertise, we cater to customers in multiple locations, providing prompt and efficient service tailored to the specific needs of customers in these communities.

### Quality Control

To maintain high standards of cleanliness, we implement rigorous quality control measures. Our cleaning staff undergo thorough training programs, and we conduct regular inspections. We believe in constant communication with our clients to address any concerns, and we continuously strive to improve our service quality.

### Safety Measures

As a professional commercial cleaning company, we prioritize the safety of our clients and employees. We strictly adhere to safety protocols and regulations, ensuring a clean work environment. Our cleaning staff receives ongoing training on safety procedures and uses eco-friendly, non-toxic cleaning products. We handle and dispose of hazardous materials properly, creating a safe, disinfected environment for everyone. We follow the guidelines provided by the [U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)](https://www.epa.gov/) to ensure effective disinfection against COVID-19 and other infections.

### Customizable Cleaning Solutions

We offer tailored cleaning plans based on your industry type and flexible scheduling to save time and minimize disruption. We understand the uniqueness of different industries' cleaning requirements and address challenges and regulations. Let us create a clean work environment that meets your standards.

### Professionalism and Expertise

With our decades of experience in the industry, our team of professional cleaning experts provides top-quality commercial cleaning services tailored to your specific needs. We prioritize customer service and strive for excellence in every cleaning job, ensuring a clean and healthy work environment.

## **Contact Us to Clean Your Business Space**

Get a free consultation by contacting our trusted commercial cleaning company today. Our experienced team of professionals is committed to delivering great results, whether it's an office or a financial institution. Let us create a clean and healthy environment for your business.

The Heiser Group offers comprehensive commercial cleaning services that prioritize honesty, integrity, quality and service. With a wide service coverage area and customizable commercial cleaning service solutions for different business site types, we ensure that your business space is clean, safe and professional. Our team is dedicated to delivering high-quality results and meeting the unique needs of your business. Whether you require regular cleaning or emergency cleaning services, we have you covered.

![commercial cleaning services](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b80a86a8a100622af4963a/62d6c2be5aaec583c2953984_Cleaning_Services_Lake_County_1.jpg)

## **Our Story**

With over 20 years of experience in the commercial cleaning industry, The Heiser Group is committed to providing top-quality cleaning services. Trusted by businesses and professionals in the Chicagoland area, we focus on customer satisfaction and building long-term relationships. We constantly evolve and adapt to meet the needs of our clients.

### **Four Pillars: Honesty, Integrity, Quality and Service**

Our janitorial service is built on building a foundation of honesty, integrity, quality and exceptional service. We prioritize honest interactions with our clients and maintain the highest level of integrity in everything we do. Our commitment to delivering quality cleaning services and providing exceptional customer service sets us apart.

‍

#### No Mess.  
Less Stress.

"Good enough" is not an option for us! For a professional cleaning service in Chicagoland that gets the job done right, contact The Heiser Group today.

## Customer Love

Don't just take our word for it. See what our happy customers and long term clients have to say!

“After major remodeling and renovation in our building, it was a disaster. David came in and assessed the situation and sent his two best guys. In one evening, they cleaned the inside of the building completely. ”
